events.name: on-layout
events.description: Emitted when drawer toggles between occupying space on page or not
events.description_zh: 当 drawer 在是否占用页面上的空间之间切换时发出

events.name: click
events.description: Emitted when user clicks/taps on the component; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode
events.description_zh: 当用户单击/点按组件时发出;在决定切换迷你模式时很有用

events.name: moueover
events.description: Emitted when user moves mouse cursor over the component; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode
events.description_zh: 当用户将鼠标光标移动到组件上时触发;在决定切换迷你模式时很有用

events.name: mouseout
events.description: Emitted when user moves mouse cursor out of the component; Useful for when taking a decision to toggle mini mode
events.description_zh: 当用户将鼠标光标移出组件时发出;在决定切换迷你模式时很有用

events.name: mini-state
events.description: Emitted when drawer changes the mini-mode state (sometimes it is forced to do so)
events.description_zh: 当 drawer 更改 mini-mode 状态时发出（有时被迫这样做）

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

overlay.description: Puts drawer into overlay mode (does not occupy space on screen, narrowing the page)
overlay.description_zh: 将抽屉置于叠加模式（不占用屏幕空间，缩小页面范围）

width.description_zh: 抽屉宽度（以像素为单位）

mini-width.description: Width of drawer (in pixels) when in mini mode
mini-width.description_zh: 迷你模式下的抽屉宽度（以像素为单位）

mini-to-overlay.description: Mini mode will expand as an overlay
mini-to-overlay.description_zh: 迷你模式将扩展为叠加层

no-mini-animation.description: Disables animation of the drawer when toggling mini mode
no-mini-animation.description_zh: 在切换 mini 模式时禁用抽屉的动画

breakpoint.description: Breakpoint (in pixels) of layout width up to which mobile mode is used
breakpoint.description_zh: 使用移动模式的布局宽度的断点（以像素为单位）

behavior.description: Overrides the default dynamic mode into which the drawer is put on
behavior.description_zh: 覆盖抽屉进入的默认动态模式

elevated.description: Adds a default shadow to the header

persistent.description: Prevents drawer from auto-closing when app's route changes; Also, an app route change won't hide it
persistent.description_zh: 防止 drawer 在 app 的路线发生变化时自动关闭;此外，应用程序路线更改不会隐藏它

show-if-above.description: Forces drawer to be shown on screen on initial render if the layout width is above breakpoint, regardless of v-model; This is the default behavior when SSR is taken over by client on initial render
show-if-above.description_zh: 如果布局宽度高于断点，则强制 drawer 在初始渲染时显示在屏幕上，而不管 v-model 如何;这是客户端在初始渲染时接管 SSR 时的默认行为

no-swipe-open.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped into view; Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature
no-swipe-open.description_zh: 禁用抽屉可以轻扫到视图中的默认行为;对于 iOS 平台很有用，因为它可能会干扰 Safari 的“滑动转到上一页/下一页”功能

no-swipe-close.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer can be swiped out of view (applies to drawer content only); Useful for iOS platforms where it might interfere with Safari's 'swipe to go to previous/next page' feature
no-swipe-close.description_zh: 禁用抽屉可以滑出视图的默认行为（仅适用于抽屉内容）;对于 iOS 平台很有用，因为它可能会干扰 Safari 的“滑动转到上一页/下一页”功能

no-swipe-backdrop.description: Disables the default behavior where drawer backdrop can be swiped
no-swipe-backdrop.description_zh: 禁用可以滑动抽屉式背景的默认行为

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component (overridden by 'mini' slot if used and drawer is in mini mode)
slots.description_zh: 组件的 devland 未开槽内容中的默认插槽（如果使用，则被 'mini' 插槽覆盖，并且抽屉处于 mini 模式）

slots.name: mini
slots.description: Content to show when in mini mode (overrides 'default' slot)
slots.description_zh: 在迷你模式下显示的内容（覆盖“默认”插槽）
